description: Hibernian 3-0 St Johnstone: Have your say
title: Hibernian 3-0 St Johnstone: Have your say
title_page: Hibernian 3-0 St Johnstone: Have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
Saints fans, did you make the trip to the capital or were you following the action from home? What did you make of your team's performance? How are you feeling about your Premiership survival hopes.
Send us your thoughts on St Johnstone
